Text:
To all the genuine rugby fans who download these torrents; please don't feed the trolls that feel the need to write silly comments and generally cause kak.

Cheers Shem.

BOKKE!!!
Shemyaza:  You are a God.  Thank you so much.  Without you I would get no Super Rugby, Tri-Nations, or World Cup.  You have fans around the world who appreciate you big time.  Rock on!
I am just about managing to keep up with the pace of the games!  How do you find the time to watch them and upload too?  I'm enjoying all the games thanks to you.

From the bottom of my heart ... thank you for all the games you upld and for bringing such quality moments into our lives. Me and my kids (2 small boys - 7 and 10 y.o.) love to watch together these games every evening.

Cheers from Romania! 
P.S.: If you ever come here ...  we'd love to make your stay as confortable as possible :)
Shem, I have a quick question re seeding - will you contact me?  chengisaofan@gmail.com - thanks
